channel.title: Applescript on MINGKYME 블로그
channel.description: Recent content in Applescript on MINGKYME 블로그

item.title: 간단한 apple script
item.description: 변수 선언 set num to 1 set str to "string" set num to num + 1 # 2 display dialog "number is " & num if 문 if true then display dialog "if" end if for 문 repeat 5 times display dialog "Hi" end repeat set charList to {"a", "b", "c"} repeat with i from 1 to count of charList set char to item i of charList display dialog char end repeat
